title: Carlos - Quick Facts
text:
Category | Food and Beverages

References: [ 1 ]

title: Carlos
text: Carlos is the largest night canteen of RP Hall , named after its owner.

title: Timings
text: Carlos is open from 7pm to 2am, although the actual hours of operation vary from day to day. It is closed on Wednesdays. [ 1 ]
